detail_desc: Short parka in cotton twill with a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Flap front pockets with a pleat and press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and hem, a tab and concealed press stud at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Pile lining.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Padded outdoor trousers with an elasticated waist, slightly higher cut at the back, zip fly and hook and loop fastening. Reflective detail on the back of one leg, elasticated hems and an elastic strap under the feet. Elastic braces with a hook and loop fastening. Fleece lining.
Gloves in soft suede with a wool-blend lining.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Ankle boots with pointed toes and a loop on either side of the shaft. Fabric linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Long-sleeved top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, lapped ribbing at the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave containing some linen. Smocking with a small frill trim at the top, short raglan sleeves, decorative buttons down the front and covered elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a silk and viscose blend with extra-long sleeves.
Sleeveless. straight-cut top in woven fabric with broderie anglaise at the hem.

Long, off-the-shoulder dress in a crinkled viscose weave with smocking at the top and short sleeves. Overlocked edges at the top and on the sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared, draped skirt with a slit in one side. Partly lined skirt.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Dungarees in soft, washed denim with adjustable straps, a chest pocket, side and back pockets, a low crotch and straight legs. The cotton content of the dungarees is partly recycled.
Short dress in woven fabric with 3/4-length sleeves with an opening and ties at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Wide jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, concealed zip down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with long raglan sleeves.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and straight legs.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with a high elasticated waist.

Long, straight-cut shirt in an airy, pattern-weave silk and cotton blend. Turn-down collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back for added width. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a draped, wrapover front with a knot detail at one side.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Wide shoulder straps, a low cut at the back and a wide, ribbed hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif. Raw edges around the neckline and sleeves.
Clamdiggers in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Cardigan in a soft jacquard knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and no buttons.
Sock boots in imitation suede with a soft elasticated shaft and covered heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Dungaree dress in patterned stretch twill with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, press-studs at the sides and pockets front and back.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with a lined drawstring hood, button placket, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Short cardigan knitted in soft bouclé yarn with a V-neck, long sleeves and a wrapover front with ties at the hem.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with an adjustable shoulder strap and an imitation suede flap with a press-stud. Two inner compartments. Lined. Size 8x15x20 cm.

Straight-cut shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Double-layered yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour stripes down the sleeves and a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and sides in a contrasting colour.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, lined hood, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, thin shoulder pads, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with a short slit at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Jersey vest top with a print motif.
One-shoulder top in cotton jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in an airy weave with a covered elasticated waistband. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and buttons, slim legs and hard-worn details.
Soft slippers with embroidery and appliqués. High shaft with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck at the front, triangular cups with removable inserts, and cut-out sections at the back and sides. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and zip down the front. Zipped front pockets with taped seams, ribbed cuffs and a fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with a wide elasticated trim at the top. Wide, embroidered flounce at the top with a scalloped edge. Elasticated hem.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles. Heel 8 cm.
Necklace in metal with faceted plastic stones. Length approx. 45-52 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Flared blouse in soft, double-weave organic cotton with embroidery at the top. Gathered yoke, long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, and buttons down the back.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in lace with a silicone trim at the top and support panels in the bodice. Detachable adjustable shoulder straps and short lace sleeves. Concealed zip and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a seam at the waist. Satin lining.

Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a brushed thermal inside, elastication and a concealed drawstring waist, a zipped key pocket at the back and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Hard smartphone case in marble-patterned plastic. Fits iPhone 6//7/8.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a wide neckline, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Short-sleeved tops in soft jersey with gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Long-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with dropped shoulders and a flounce trim on the sleeves.
Cropped, fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Cardigan in soft, ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shirt in cotton twill with a concealed button-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Shirt in mulberry silk with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and tie belt. Fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline, long, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short skirt in jersey with an elasticated waist and sewn-in wrapover at the front with decorative flounces. Unlined.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Lace top with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long, wide sleeves. Unlined.
Jacquard-knit hat with earflaps, faux fur details, a sewn-in turn-up at the front and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with adjustable straps that fasten at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Large earrings in metal and plastic with a hanging hoop. Length 5.5 cm.
Padded, sleeveless fancy dress costume in jersey.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Aviator-style,tinted sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in a linen and cotton weave with a deep V-neck, concealed zip at the back and short sleeves. Seam at the waist with a tie belt, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Vest top in soft ribbed jersey made from Tencel™ lyocell with a V-neck front and back.
5-pocket jeans in sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, sleeveless tunic in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a round neck and flare to the hem. Lined at the top.

Short V-neck dress in plumeti chiffon with gathers and a small frill at the shoulders, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with frilled tiers. Lined.
